name: HSP_ACCT_CHG_LIST
description: This table contains the hospital account charge list, which is the transaction list associated with the account.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the hospital account charge list related group.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the charge in the charge list on this hospital account.
